newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Perfectech in printer takeover talks.
newsitem.headline: Perfectech in printer takeover talks.

text.p: Plastic packaging products maker Perfectech International Holdings Ltd said on Thursday it was in talks on taking over a printing business.

"The negotiation of the takeover of the printing business is at a preliminary stage and the company at the moment has no intention or plan to make any private or public placement of the company's share capital," it said in a statement.
Perfectech did not identify the printing business.
The company's shares were up two cents at HK$1.57 just before the midday break.
